thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Production Manager - Sports - Sports Media

title: Production Manager - Sports - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Act as an effective communication conduit between Operations Management and Production teams. Coordinate all day-to-day logistics such as scheduling, catering, transportation   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
